comment: Worst class ever. Could not understand him. Was not very knowledgeable of Criminal Justice issues, especially current practices.  Should not be teaching in the United States.

Worst Professor I ever had. Could not understand him and he was not very knowledgeable of current Criminal Justice practices. Does not take criticism very well. Would switch to another University if I had to take him again.

Nice professor.  I took his online class and just as any other is heavy reading and many assignments & discussion board interaction.  Exams are Fill in blank and essay they are not an easy A.  One project to do for course.  Was very interesting and would recommend this instructor.
Classes were so boring could barley understand him had a very strong accent withdrew from this class

Absolutely the worst teacher ever.  Failed me by half a point.  Took points off my grade because my brother was in the hospital and I missed class.  He also never uses the book but magically expects you to understand everything.
Probably the worst class I have taken. I would avoid him if you could.
Hands down, the WORST professor ever!

Took this one online and found it pretty interesting and easy to follow.  There is a lot of work through the book and quizzes, but it is not hard to find what you are looking for. Don't buy book before he says, because I heard he changes it a lot.

I took his class online and enjoyed it allot. He is very clear with what he wants out of you, and he answers his emails as soon as he gets it, very helpful. There is allot of work but its not that bad. There is one paper. His tests are somewhat hard, but as long as you read the book you should be fine. Would definitely recommend him.
Was a pretty good online class.  Tests were not easy, but if you read, you can get an A.

Online class:2 exams (hint write all the terms in excel with pg #'s A-Z) 1 paper.One HW assignment(answer questions about the sylb)2 Discussion questions.End ch Q's(work with a group) hopefully u get a hard working group.not hard class he grades easy but you have to complete the work. Exams are hard.dont turn things in late.Overall not bad online.
Dr. C. is a teacher that likes to use trickery on his test.  Not very fair.  Will not side with the student.
I took the online course.  Professor was well organized, clear in his class requirements and fair.  I learned a lot and would take a class with Dr. C. again.

Took this class in the summer online. There's 4 open book exams, one paper, and one discussion posts. He outlines how he wants you to do the paper. The exams are based on 3-4 chapters. Interesting class. Put forth some effort and you should get an A.

Took this class online in the summer, there were 2 discussion posts, 2 papers, and a final (open book)online.It was not easy work, but a A or B is attainable if you put forth the effort.The final weighs heavy(30%), so make sure to read book. He outlines exactly how he wants you to do the papers, follow it, and you should get a good grade

I went to Thailand on an SA with Dr. C and it was incredible. He got **** a few times with us, driving back from the bar with a bunch of Bangkok metros they had to stop and let one of the students out to puke. got an A and it was just awesome!

If you can get around taking this professor the entire time you're at KSU...do it! Very hard to understand. He will tell you one way to do something, then when you do it and turn it in, he'll say its wrong. Nice guy, terrible teacher. The class will slowly start to make sense as the semester continues, but it is still really hard!

Worst professor I have ever had. He will make your life miserable. He actually gave me a 0 on a term paper that I turned in 2 weeks early. Do not take this professor if you want to keep a good GPA. He is the absolute worst.
Do not take this proffesor. He is the worst!!!!
